## Shape.IsGrouped property

Determines whether the shape is grouped. Read-only Boolean.

```csharp
public bool IsGrouped { get; }
```

### Remarks

Property [`ParentGroup`](../parentgroup) returns parent GroupShape object if shape is grouped.
